questSteps.stepDescription: Talk to Brundt the Chieftain in the longhall in Rellekka. (Chat 3•✓•1)
additionalStepInformation: If Mountain Daughter has been completed but you never talked to Brundt the Chieftain after its completion: (Chat 2•3•✓•1)

questSteps.stepDescription: Talk to Manni the Reveller in the longhall next to Brundt. (Chat 1)
Pick up a Keg of beer and Beer from one of the tables.
Travel to Seers' Village and purchase a low alcohol keg from the Poison Salesman. (Chat 2•1)
Use beer on council workman at the bridge south of Rellekka. He will give you a strange object.
Follow steps in Additional Info once complete go challenge Manni. (Chat 1)
additionalStepInformation: Light the strange object
Use it on the pipe on the eastern wall of the longhall.
Enter the Longhall.
Mix the Low Alcohol Keg into the other Keg then the strange object will explode.

questSteps.stepDescription: Speak to Olaf the Bard, who is located east of the longhall. (Chat 1)
Travel to the swaying tree, east of Rellekka's southern border, north-west of the Golden Apple Tree on the world map.
Chop off a branch and craft it into an unstrung lyre.
Head south-east and talk to Lalli near the Golden Apple Tree and ask him about golden wool. You must complete the conversation or speaking to Askeladden will not work. (Chat 1)
Return to Rellekka and speak with Askeladden who is south of the longhall. He will give you a pet rock.
In the south-east part of Rellekka, grab a raw potato, an onion, and cabbage from the farm. It's recommended to pick an extra onion and cabbage in case you accidentally eat them.
Return to Lalli. Talk to him twice to tell him that you can make him a delicious stone soup.
"Use" the potato, onion, cabbage, and rock on Lalli's Stew. Talk to Lalli again.
Use the Golden fleece on the spinning wheel in south-west Rellekka. Use the golden wool on the unstrung lyre.
Travel to the peninsula located south-west of Rellekka with the lyre. Use the raw shark on the strange altar. A Fossegrimen spirit will bless your lyre.
Return to Rellekka and enter the backstage of the long hall through the north-east door that is guarded by a bouncer. Play your lyre in front of the crowd. You will receive Olaf's vote.
talk to Sigli near Rellekka's southern entrance. (Chat 1•1)
Use the received hunters' talisman to locate and kill the Draugen.
itemsNeeded:
5,000 coins then go 
talk to Sigmund in the marketplace. (Chat 1)
additionalStepInformation: The Draugen is not visible until you get close to his location.
Look for a tiny grey butterfly.
There are only a few of these, one of which is the Draugen.
Once in melee distance of the butterfly, use the 'Locate' function on the talisman once again, and the Draugen will appear.
Do not drop or lose the talisman as it contains the Draugen's spirit, so you will have to fight him again!

questSteps.stepDescription: Return to Sigli to get his vote.
Talk to Sigmund in the marketplace. (Chat 1)
Talk to the Sailor on the middle dock about the exotic flower. He wants a romantic ballad. (Chat 1)
Talk to Olaf the Bard, east of the longhall. He wants sturdy boots. (Chat 1)
Talk to Yrsa in the clothing store, just west of the marketplace. She wants a fiscal statement. (Chat 1)
Talk to Brundt in the longhall, he wants a tracking map. (Chat 1)
Talk to Sigli south of the longhall, he wants a custom bowstring made. (Chat 1)
Talk to Skulgrimen in the helmet store just north of the longhall. He wants the unusual fish that the Fisherman caught. (Chat 1)
Talk to the Fisherman on the first dock west of the helmet store. He wants a sea fishing map. (Chat 1)
Talk to Swensen the Navigator in a house south of the market. He wants a weather forecast. (Chat 1)
Talk to Peer the Seer west of Swensen. He wants a warriors' contract. (Chat 1)
Talk to Thorvald the Warrior in the helmet store. He wants a champion's token. (Chat 1)
Talk to Manni the Reveller in the longhall. He wants a legendary cocktail. (Chat 1)
Talk to Thora in the longhall. She wants a promissory note. (Chat 1)
Talk to Askeladden outside the longhall. Buy the promissory note for 5,000 gp. (Chat 1•1)
Give the promissory note to Thora. (Chat 1)
Give the legendary cocktail to Manni. (Chat 1)
Give the champion's token to Thorvald. (Chat 1)
Give the warrior's contract to the Seer. (Chat 1)
Give the weather forecast to Swensen. (Chat 1)
Give the sea fishing map to the Fisherman. (Chat 1)
Give the unusual fish to Skulgrimen. (Chat 1)
Give the custom bowstring to Sigli. (Chat 1)
Give the tracking map to Brundt. (Chat 1)
Give the fiscal statement to Yrsa. (Chat 1)
Give the sturdy boots to Olaf. (Chat 1)
Give the Fremennik ballad to the Sailor. (Chat 1)
Give the exotic flower to Sigmund. You will receive his vote.
Talk to Swensen the Navigator in his house south-west of the longhall. (Chat 1)
Go down the ladder in the small room in his house. In each room, there are four portals. Enter them in the correct order to receive his vote. The Portal Directions are in Additional Info.
additionalStepInformation: South
West
East
North
South
East
North

questSteps.stepDescription: Climb up the ladder, then talk to Swensen. You will receive his vote.
Read Additional Info before talking to Thorvald the Warrior in the helmet store north of the longhall. (Chat 1)
additionalStepInformation: Make sure to store all armour and weapons prior to visiting Thorvald.
You must defeat him at least three out of four times.
You must fight to the death.
You are not allowed to use weapons or armour or beasts of burden.
You must defeat him at least three out of four times.
You must fight to the death.
You are not allowed to use weapons or armour or beasts of burden.
You can use food, prayer, rings of recoil, already summoned familiars, a pickaxe or hatchet removed from your tool belt, the ancestor spirits aura, or even a dismantled godsword)

questSteps.stepDescription: Go into the basement to begin the fight. Run in circles from arena to arena in order for him to spawn.
Defeat Koschei three times and either kill him the fourth time or let yourself be defeated. (You will not die).
additionalStepInformation: Koschei has 4 forms, each one more difficult than the last.
There is no safe spot to attack him from, although you can trap him over the poles with fire burning on top of them and heal yourself.
Don't stay there too long or he'll disappear and reappear after you return to combat, and you'll start over at his first form.

questSteps.stepDescription: Talk to Thorvald the Warrior to receive his vote.
Speak to Peer the Seer who can be found south-west of the market in Rellekka. (Chat 1)
To enter his house you must solve a simple puzzle. Possible answers are in Additional Info.
additionalStepInformation: "tree"
"time"
"life"
"mage"
"fire"
"wind"
"mind"
"disk"

questSteps.stepDescription: Enter the building and go upstairs in Additional Info Study, Search and Open these Items/Objects in the room.
additionalStepInformation: Study the unicorn's head for an old red disk.
Study the bull's head for a wooden disk.
Search the bookcase for a red herring.
Open then search the eastern chest for an empty jug.
Open then search the south-west cupboard for an empty bucket.

questSteps.stepDescription: Follow the Steps in Additional Info to Proceed.
additionalStepInformation: Cook the red herring to get sticky red goop
Use  the red goop on the wooden disk to get a second red disk.
Go down the eastern trapdoor and use the two disks on the abstract mural for a vase lid.

questSteps.stepDescription: Climb the ladder then follow this sequence in Additional Info.
additionalStepInformation: Use the empty jug on the tap, then the full jug on the empty bucket.
Use the empty jug on the tap again and fill the bucket. You'll have a full bucket and a 1/3rds full jug.
Use the full bucket on the drain to get an empty bucket. Or search the cupboard again.
Use the 1/3rds full jug on the empty bucket.
Use the empty jug on the tap, then use the full jug on the 1/5ths full bucket to get a 4/5ths full bucket.
Use the 4/5ths full bucket on the northwestern chest to receive a vase.
Use the vase on the tap.
Use the vase lid on the vase of water to get a sealed vase.
Use the sealed vase on the frozen table to receive a frozen key.

questSteps.stepDescription: Thaw the frozen key on the range, then go down the eastern ladder and out the exit. You will receive Peer the Seer's vote.
Talk to Brundt the Chieftain in the longhall in Rellekka.
Quest Complete!
